text: haey chea karpit nasa yeung ban bratan aoy louk mean nouv pheap chhleasavei ( daoy yeung mean bantoul tha) chaur anak doengkoun champoh a l laoh . haey anaknea del doengkoun( champoh trong) pitabrakd nasa ke doengkoun champoh khluon ke phtal . te chn na haey ban rmil koun vinh noh pitabrakd nasa a l laoh mha mean leusalb(min trauvkar avei teangoasa) chea ti kaotasarsaer
